title: Spacious & Luxurious One Bed Apartment in West Loop!
posting_body: Contact today to schedule your private tour!
Your home the way you want it!This apartment is luxury living in Fulton Market.
The building features a vintage and industrial inspired aesthetic, built with high-end amenities for a modern lifestyle.
Fulton Market is a uniquely historic and fast-emerging neighborhood, next door to Union Park, major area employers, and West Loop's acclaimed food and drink lineup.
On-site amenities include a 24-hour reception, business centre, meeting room facilities, gym, swimming pool and communal residents lounge.
This building provides corporate housing in Chicago just a 6 minute walk from the nearest subway station, 1 mile from the nearest train station and 10 miles from Chicago Midway International Airport.
Now, The building is bringing its take on the classic warehouse style building, crafted with contemporary designs and unique amenities, to meet all your modern needs.
Rent Includes:: Cable, Gas, Internet, Water
